sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Grid, Segment, Header, Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'

import pokemon from './pokemonDatabase.json'

import * as R from 'ramda'

const makePokemonListItem = ({name, pokedex_number}) => (
  <Segment key={pokedex_number} basic>
    <Segment attached>
      <Header content={`${pokedex_number} ${name}`} />
    </Segment>
    <Button.Group attached="bottom">
      <Button>Info</Button>
      <Button content="Add to team" />
    </Button.Group>
  </Segment>
)

function App() {
  return (
    <Grid>
      <Grid.Row>
        <Grid.Column width={10}>
          <Segment basic>
          {
            R.map(makePokemonListItem, pokemon)
          }
          </Segment>
        </Grid.Column>
        <Grid.Column width={6}>Column2</Grid.Column>
      </Grid.Row>
    </Grid>
  )
}

export default App;
